string.text: Hello there!
Hi!
Where is the money for the task?
Find my assistant and you'll have the money.
Fine, but no tricks this time!
Who are you?
Alex "Jawbone" is my name! And these vagabonds are my team!
What are you and your guys doing here?
My guys and I are resting here! As soon as we're done, we'll advance to Prypyat!
What do you know about Prypyat?

I know that this is old abandoned town of the communism epoch! This is mainly from history. I believe that it is now aswarmed with monsters and the crowds of monolithians! The ones who went there haven't returned!
Do you think it's very dangerous there?
No doubts, as for now those who went there haven't yet returned.
Have you seen militaries somewhere nearby?
No, no militaries in view, it has been a long time I haven't seen any militant.
Maybe you've met any military stalkers?

Rumors say that they've appeared somewhere on the very Radar base, well right near the antennas! Once they were deactivated, a lot of people rushed to Radar and further to Prypyat! We've been stuck here for day, but no one yet poked a nose in here. Perhaps, someone blocked off the road here.
You think the path to Radar is blocked off by the militaries?

I don't think so, it's been a long time I haven't seen them, but the military stalkers could for sure! They don't play jokes, they are really tough guys, acting swiftly and well-coordinated, I wonder why haven't they blocked the road up earlier!
Why haven't they gone to Prypyat or haven't blocked off the road there?
I dunno, maybe they are afraid and or preparing to something, we have only to guess what they have on mind.
Maybe you have a task for me?
Well, I've got one, but it's not of easy ones, will you take it?
Yes, I'm not afraid of such wordings!
No, drop it, I've got no time!
I see, but I'm scared too, I prefer to spend some money and send someone instead of me and my guys!

Well, good! The task is as follows, find my scouts, Crowbar and Log! They went to Prypyat, while I decided not to go headlong into the tiger's jaw, thus I've sent the best of the best there! Find them alive and get them there, and if they perished bring me their guns! Once you fufil the task and you'll receive 2000 dough!!!
Okay, deal!
Too little money, rise it to 4000 dough and we're done, deal?
This is all I can offer for this task!
Great, I'll wait you here!
Task accomplished!
Perfect, give me his PDA!
Take it, give me the money!
What a cheeky setup, if to consider that he had nothing with him!
I'm gonna whack you now!
Get into my sight again, I'll do you in!
Okay, I see, good luck!
I can't give you anything, no money. If you'd like, you could leave me his junk!
No money! Dismissed!
I haven't found him yet!
Find him quicker, if you want to get your money!
I've found your guys, they died - here is their weapons!
Thanks, then I think that they have perished, thus there is no sense to go to Prypyat yet! The only problem remains, I can't give you money for the task. My assistant has gone with the money!
Good, I'll find him! Tell me where to search for him? And don't even think to chuck me again!
I think he couldn't get away long ago, he can be, let me mark it on your map, here or here! When you find him, bring him to me or his pda.
Good, wait for me!!!
I haven't found them yet.
Search for him faster! I cant wait forever!! Good luck!
